data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body: In terms of provisions of Regulation 30 (read with Part A of Schedule III) and other applicable provisions of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (Listing Regulations) we wish to inform you that Dr. Sanjeev Kumar Sharma President- Manufacturing Quality & R&D designated as Senior Management Personnel (SMP) of the Company has tendered his resignation from the services of the Company effective from close of business hours of 2nd February 2026 due to personal reasons and consequently shall cease to be SMP of the Company

data.caption: Intimation For Incorporation Of Step-Down Subsidiaries Of The Company.
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Schedule III of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 we hereby inform you that Wockhardt Bio AG a Subsidiary of the Company has incorporated three new Wholly Owned Subsidiaries Wockhardt Swiss AG (Switzerland) Wockhardt Suisse USA Holding Corporation (USA) and Wockhardt Suisse USA LLC (USA). Consequent to the Incorporation Wockhardt Swiss AG Wockhardt Suisse USA Holding Corporation and Wockhardt Suisse USA LLC have become Step- Down Subsidiaries of the Company.

data.caption: Reply To Email Related To Volume Movement
data.news_body: In response to your captioned letter dated 02.12.2025 we would like to state that we have reviewed and verified the relevant internal records operations and developments and hereby confirm that there is no information/announcement or events which in our opinion has a bearing on price/volume movement which require disclosure under Reg. 30 of SEBI Listing Regulations.

data.news_body:

The reply is awaited.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: This is to inform you that pursuant to Companys Code of Conduct for regulating monitoring and reporting trading by designated persons (the Code) the Trading Window for dealing in equity shares of the Company will be closed from 1st April 2025 until 48 hours after the declaration of audited financial results of the Company for the financial year ended 31st March 2025.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Allotment of ESOP / ESPS
data.news_body: We wish to inform you that the Share allotment Committee of the Board of Directors of the Company has allotted 13250 equity shares of face value Rs. 5/- each on 14th February 2025

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Allotment of ESOP / ESPS
data.news_body: We wish to inform you that the Share allotment Committee of the Board of Directors of the Company has allotted 13250 equity shares of face value Rs. 5/- each on 14th February 2025

data.caption: Integrated Filing (Financial)
data.news_body: We are submitting herewith the Integrated Filing (Financial) for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December 2024.

data.caption: Statement On Deviation Or Variation Of Funds Raised Through Qualified Institutions Placements For The Quarter Ended 31St December 2024
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 32(1) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 read with SEBI Circular No. SEBI/HO/CFD/PoD2/CIR/P/0155 dated November 11 2024 we  hereby confirm that there has been no deviation in the utilisation of the issue proceeds from the object as stated in the Placement Documents dated 26th March 2024 and 11th November 2024 and accordingly the Statements of Deviations in the prescribed format confirming Nil deviation duly reviewed by the Audit Committee are attached

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Monitoring Agency Report
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 32(6) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 read with Regulation 173(A) of the SEBI ( Issue of Capital and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2018 please find attached Monitoring Agency Reports towards utilisation of proceeds of following Qualified institutions Placements ("QIPs") for the quarter ended 31st December 2024 issued by CRISIL Rating Limited duly reviewed and taken on record by Board of Directors & Audit Committee of the Company
1. QIP of Rs. 480.04 crore vide Placement Document dated 26.03.2024 (Annexure 1)
2. QIP of Approx. Rs. 1000 crore vide Placement Document dated 11.11.2024 (Annexure 2)

data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (Listing Regulations); and in continuation to our letter bearing reference no. No.: WOCK/SEC/SE/2024-25/086 dated 3rd February 2025 we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. 7th February 2025 inter-alia have approved the Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December 2024

data.news_body: WOCKHARDT LTD.has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 07/02/2025 inter alia to consider and approve Pursuant to Regulation 29(1) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and is closure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we wish to inform you that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on Friday 7th February 2025 inter-alia to consider and approve the Un-Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter and nine months  ended 31st December 2024

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Press Release / Media Release
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI Listing Regulations please find enclosed Press Release - "Wockhardts Zaynich (Zidebactam/Cefepime WCK 5222) achieves highest-ever efficacy meeting superiority in a global pivotal registration-enabling Phase III study in complicated urinary infection (cUTI) achieving 96.8% clinical cure rate"

data.descriptor: Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018
data.caption: Compliances-Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 74(5) of SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations 2018 please find attached the Compliance Certificate received from MUFG Intime India Pvt Ltd (Formerly known as Link Intime India Pvt Ltd) RTA of the Company for the Quarter ended 31st December 2024.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Press Release / Media Release
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI Listing Regulations please find attached Press Release titled "Zaynich(Zidebactum/Cefepime. WCK 5222)achieves over 97% Efficacy in Clinical Study for serious infections caused by by Meropenem-Resistant Gram-Negative Pathogens."

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Press Release / Media Release
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the Listing Regulations please find attached Press Release titled- Indian Drug Regulator Approves Wockhardts New Generation Oral Antibiotic MiqnafR (Nafithromycin) for the Treatment of Community-Acquired Bacterial Pneumonia (CABP).

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Press Release / Media Release
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI Listing Regulations, please find attached Press Release titled, Zaynich TM (Zidebactam/Cefepime, WCK 5222) enables US cancer patient undergo successful liver transplant and resume chemotheraphy by eradicating dual extreme-drug resistant Gram negative pathogens

data.news_body: Pursuant to the requirement of the Regulation 39(3) of the SEBI Listing Regulations, we wish to inform you that our RTA has intimated about receipt of the request for the issuance of Duplicate Share Certificate in lieu of the Original Certificate lost/misplaced.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Allotment
data.news_body: Please find enclosed herewith the Outcome of the Capital Raising Committee of Wockhardt Limited for allotment of 90,49,773 equity shares pursuant to Qualified Institutional Placement.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Meeting Of The Capital Raising Committee
data.news_body: Outcome of the meeting of the Capital Raising Committee for closure of Issue, approval of issue price, approval  of placement document and approval of confirmation of allocation note for Qualified institutions placement of equity shares of face value of ?5 each to Qualified Institutional Buyers by Wockhardt Limited.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Intimation Of The Meeting Of Board Of Directors Of Wockhardt Limited
data.news_body: WOCKHARDT LTD.has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 13/11/2024 ,inter alia, to consider and approve Pursuant to Regulation 29(1) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on Wednesday, 13th November, 2024, inter-alia, to consider and approve the Un-Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) of the Company for the half year ended 30th September, 2024.In view of the above, the trading window for dealing in the shares of the Company, which was closed from Tuesday, 1st October, 2024, shall remain closed until 48 hours after the declaration of financial results on 13th November, 2024.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Meeting Of The Capital Raising Committee For Qualified Institutions Placement Of Equity Shares Of Face Value Of ? 5 Each (The 'Equity Shares') To Qualified Institutional Buyers ('QIB').
data.news_body: Please find enclosed herewith Outcome of the meeting of the Capital Raising Committee for Qualified institutions placement of equity shares of face value of ? 5 each (the 'Equity Shares') to qualified institutional buyers ('QIB') by Wockhardt Limited under the provisions of Chapter VI of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Issue of Capital and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2018, and Sections 42 and 62 (1) (c) of the Companies Act, 2013, read with Rule 14 of the Companies (Prospectus and Allotment of Securities) Rules, 2014, each as amended, (the 'Issue').

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) For The Quarter And Half Year Ended 30Th September, 2023
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 of the Listing Regulations read with Schedule III of the Listing Regulations, we enclose herewith Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and half year ended 30th September, 2023 along with the Limited Review Report thereon issued by B S R & Co. LLP Statutory Auditors of the Company as approved in the Board Meeting held on 14.11.2023.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 and in continuation to our letter dated 4th August, 2023, we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. 14th August, 2023, have approved the unaudited financial results (standalone & consolidated) for the quarter ended 30th June, 2023.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulations 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (''Listing Regulations'); and in continuation to our letter bearing reference no. Ref. No.: WOCK/SEC/SE/2023-24/034 dated 4th August, 2023, we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company, at its meeting held today i.e. 14th August, 2023, inter-alia to approve the Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter ended 30th June, 2023 and noted the resignation of Mr. Debashis Dey as Company Secretary of the Company with effect from end of working hours on 18th August 2023 and approved the appointment of Ms. Rashmi Mamtura in his place with effect from 19th August 2023.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulations 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (''Listing Regulations'); audited Financial Results of the Company as on March 31, 2023 are enclosed.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulations 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (''Listing Regulations'); outcome of the Board meeting held today i.e. 26th May, 2023 is enclosed.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Earnings Call Transcript
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligation and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 and further to our communication dated February 21, 2023, please find enclosed transcript of the investor call.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligation and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 and further to our communication dated February 14, 2023, we enclose herewith the Investor Presentation discussed during Investor Call held today i.e. Tuesday, February 21, 2023 at 16:00 hrs IST through VC. The Investor Presentation is also available on the website of the Company at the link:https://statutory.wockhardt.com/stock_exchange_disclosures.htmDr. Habil Khorakiwala (Chairman) and Dr. Murtaza Khorakiwala (Managing Director) participated in the Investor Call. The audio - video recording of the Investor Call has been uploaded on the Company's website and the same can be accessed at the link:https://statutory.wockhardt.com/stock_exchange_disclosures.htm

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulations 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (''Listing Regulations'); we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company, at its meeting held today i.e. 13th February, 2023, inter-alia, have approved the Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December, 2022; and Limited Review Report thereon issued by B S R & Co. LLP., Statutory Auditors of the Company;

Pursuant to Regulations 30 and 33 of Listing Regulations read with Schedule III of Listing Regulations, we enclose herewith the following:

a. Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter and nine months ended
31st December, 2022; and Limited Review Report issued by B S R & Co. LLP., Statutory Auditors of the Company (enclosed as Annexure I).
b. A copy of the Press Release proposed to be issued in respect of the said Financial Results (enclosed as Annexure II).
